base_description: Gray cabinet with wooden top, rectangular shape.
part_description: Two main sections with four panel doors, rectangular wooden top, and side handles. The doors are evenly arranged in two rows, each with two panels. The handles are positioned on either side of the cabinet.
internal_interaction_description: The doors open to reveal storage compartments within the cabinet. Each section is likely to have shelves for organizing items. The doors are hinged to allow smooth opening and closing, providing access to the interior space.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or used as a standalone piece. It interacts with users through the opening and closing of doors, allowing access to stored items. The top surface can be used for placing objects or as a workspace.
